name: agricultural
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used for farming or relating to farming: The world's supply of agricultural land is shrinking fast. She's studying agricultural science. The country's economy is mainly agricultural (= based on farming).
More examplesFewer examplesBritain's farmers have faced the double whammy of a rising pound and falling agricultural prices.garden/household/agricultural implementsagricultural/dairy/fresh producePost-war economic reconstruction in the country must begin with the resumption of agricultural production.There are irrigation channels all over this flat agricultural land.
